name: Rageball
overview: The futuristic sport of Rageball is fast and aggressive, played by teams of exiled convicts who have nothing to lose, and broadcast around the globe to countless violence-hungry fans. The single player takes the role of the manager of an up-and-coming Rageball squad, coaching the players to victory and placing smart bets to augment the team coffers. Up to four competitors can battle against one another using the PSX Multi-Tap adaptor. It's the year 2612, and the world's worst criminals are sent to an asteroid called IS-326 aka ''THE HELL''. They play this game called Rage Ball in order to get food and clothes etc..., basically Rage Ball is a copy of soccer with no rules, and the ball is an iron skull. Where criminals on a deserted asteroid got an iron skull to play a game with, There are three games mode: - Tournament - Cup ,choose one of 26 teams and try to win the cup - Single match Features: * Experience the brutality of the futuristic sport known as "Rageball" * Gain the upperhand by employing five different tactics on the field * Hire a Marksman to slow down your opponents
